meanings.definition: In a bad-tempered or irritable manner.
meanings.sent1: She answered peevishly, clearly in a bad mood.
meanings.sent2: He sighed peevishly when asked to do his chores.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed peevishly when its food bowl was empty.
meanings.sent4: The engine sputtered peevishly before finally starting.
meanings.sent5: The rain fell peevishly, making everyone grumpy.
meanings.sent6: Despite her best efforts, she could not help but respond peevishly.
meanings.sent7: The child pouted peevishly when told it was bedtime.

meanings.sent1: His peevishly folded arms showed his annoyance.
meanings.sent2: The customer left the store peevishly after waiting too long.
meanings.sent3: The peevishly ticking clock seemed to mock his impatience.
meanings.sent4: The peevishly buzzing fly irritated everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: Her peevishly tapping foot revealed her impatience.
meanings.sent6: The peevishly scowling man made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent7: The peevishly written note conveyed her annoyance clearly.
